resources.string:
1. After hiding, you may have to uninstall and reinstall to display the icon again.
2. In some systems, hiding the desktop icon will cause this page to be closed, and it will be difficult for you to open this page again.
3. Some systems do not support this function.
Do you want to continue?
Android 7 and above, because security issues do not discourage the use of fileUri, therefore, turning on this option will consent to the security risk it brings
